title: Muc-Off to offer Ultrasonic Chain Optimization Service at your Local Bike Shop
content:
Following the release of their Ludicrous AF chain lube claimed to be the fastest bicycle drivetrain lubricant in the World, Muc-Off is offering a pro-level chain optimization service to select bicycle dealers, utilizing their new Ultrasonic Clean and Lube Tanks. The service has long been available to the likes of the INEOS Grenadiers, EF Education-NIPPO,

The post Muc-Off to offer Ultrasonic Chain Optimization Service at your Local Bike Shop appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
